message: Let's be fair, I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  I'm sure we can work something out.
I'm not afraid of a little risk. Will you take a chance on a better outcome?
Let's meet in the middle. I'll take 60%, you take 40%.  This way we both get a decent amount and avoid further inflation.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more than 40%. I'm hoping you'll reconsider.
